Title: Die Hand Die Verletzt
Plot: The ritualistic murder of a teenager in a small town gets Mulder and Scully caught up in a secret occult practice within the local school's PTA and a substitute teacher with strange powers.
GuestStars: Susan Blommaert, Dan Butler, Heather McComb, P. Lynn Johnson, Shaun Johnson, Travis MacDonald, Michele Goodger, Larry Musser, Frank Czinege, Laura Harris, Doug Abrahams
